July 23, 2012, Elizabeth was a client of Kelly’s

Kelly is a master at what she does.  Kelly doesn't lower her standards related to Pilates for any reason and her clients appreciate that.  She is an exemplary role model for her profession, her clients and an excellent teacher.  Kelly is always looking for improvements for her studio while appreciating the valuable classical methodologies of Pilates exercises.  Kelly is an inspiration to her colleagues as well as her clients.

Melanie Gentry
Certified Pilates Instructor
June 14, 2012, Melanie was a client of Kelly’s

Kelly is a dynamic, high energy, professional Pilates instructor and business owner. Her group and private classes are well rounded, challenging and an excellent value. I achieved results I didn't think we're possible. I am stronger with increased muscle definition and improved posture. My physique has improved with a loss of 16 inches overall and I decreased my booty from a size 8 to a size 4. I highly recommend Kelly, her instructors and Remedy Pilates.

Suzanne Spear Kyker, CMM
Global Events Manager at Epicor Software
June 13, 2012, Suzanne was a client of Kelly’s

What most impresses me about Kelly is her dedication, not just to the craft of Pilates, but her dedication to each of her clients.  She took the time to understand my fitness goals and my health concerns.  Given those, she custom-tailored a fitness program that delivered on both.  She constantly challenges me, and changes my routine, and I am never bored nor do I ever "dread" going to class, which is highly unusual for me.  I highly recommend Kelly, and Remedy Pilates.  The facility is one which allows for individuals to concentrate solely on their own workout, regardless of how many others are in a session, and the staff is friendly.  What are you waiting for?

Heidi Majidi, PLC
Realtor at REMAX Fine Properties
June 9, 2012, Heidi was a client of Kelly’s

I have been working out with Kelly since 2005. I was brand new to pilates when I first started and now consider myself to be very advanced (and strong). Kelly catered workouts to meet my specific needs and modified them through injuries and both times I have been pregnant.  I went from novice to advanced in a very short time with her.  She has upbeat, high energy classes that make you want to push harder to reach your goals. I love working out with Kelly and would highly suggest her to anyone I know. She is also the BEST with pregnant belly pilates...=0)

June 13, 2012, Kelly was a client of Heidi’s

We worked with Heidi to sell our patio home back in 2006. We did not even list the property and had an offer from one of her buyers that we could not refuse. We have also called on Heidi to help us through questions regarding refinance, short sells, etc. She has always been our go-to person for the latest information on the market and the ever changing laws. Heidi is an amazing Agent.

summary: Experienced Owner with a demonstrated history of working in the health wellness and fitness industry. Skilled in Wellness Coaching, Fitness Training, Corrective Exercise, Anatomy, and Athletics.
